mapper.sql: ID, OFFICIALDOCUMENTID, FILEPATH, SUFFIX, SIZE, FILENAME, SOURCEFILEFLAG, UPLOADDATE, USERID, ORGID ,DELIVERID ,SEALPATH
mapper.insert: insert into t_oa_officialdocument_file (ID, OFFICIALDOCUMENTID, FILEPATH, SUFFIX, SIZE, FILENAME, SOURCEFILEFLAG, UPLOADDATE, USERID, ORGID , DELIVERID ,SEALPATH ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{officialdocumentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcefileflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploaddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{deliverid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{sealpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into t_oa_officialdocument_file ( officialdocumentid, filepath, suffix, size, filename, sourcefileflag, uploaddate, userid, orgid ,deliverid ,sealpath) values
( #{item.officialdocumentid}, #{item.filepath}, #{item.suffix}, #{item.size},
#{item.filename}, #{item.sourcefileflag},
#{item.uploaddate}, #{item.userid}, #{item.orgid}, #{item.deliverid}, #{item.sealpath} )
mapper.update:
update t_oa_officialdocument_file
OFFICIALDOCUMENTID = #{officialdocumentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FILEPATH = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUFFIX = #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIZE = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
FILENAME = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCEFILEFLAG = #{sourcefileflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPLOADDATE = #{uploaddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELIVERID = #{deliverid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SEALPATH = #{sealpath,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
